## buildrc

buildrc brings tabs to terraform

```
buildrc [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --debug         Print debug output
  -f, --file string   The buildrc file to use (default ".buildrc")
  -h, --help          help for buildrc
  -q, --quiet         Do not print any output
  -v, --version       Print version and exit
```
